item.title: Software stocks enter bear market on AI disruption fear with ServiceNow plunging 11% Thursday
item.description: The iShares Expanded Tech-Software Sector ETF is on pace for its biggest one-day decline since April 4 during the tariff-triggered downturn.

item.title: ‘Climate of fear’: ICE violence in Minnesota forces CEOs to weigh the risks of speaking out against Trump
item.description: Minneapolis has become the testing ground for when and how far corporate leaders will wade into escalating political tensions.

item.description: These are the stocks posting the largest moves in the premarket.

item.title: Powell says Cook Supreme Court case is the most important in the Fed's 113-year history
item.description: Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent has called Powell's decision to attend a "mistake," accusing Powell of politicizing the case.
